description: Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref: 68663/APP/2023/1933, dated 22-12-23 (Refurbishment of existing retail unit for use within Class E(a) including the sale of non-food and food and drink products, installation of new shopfront, reconfiguration of car park, landscaping, external plant and associated works), in order to amend Condition 11 (Inclusive Access).
decision_conditions: Condition 11 (Inclusive Access) of planning permission reference 68663/APP/2023/1933, dated 22-12-23, is amended to:

The shopfront hereby approved shall ensure that step-free access for wheelchair users is achieved from the public footway, via a profiled threshold or water bar not exceeding 15 mm in height, and two separate entrance and exit doors providing an effective, clear width of no less than 1050 mm. All such features shall remain in place for the life of the building.
To ensure an accessible and inclusive development is delivered in accordance with Policy D5 of the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Condition 11, which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 68663/APP/2023/1933, dated 22-12-23, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
